CheckTitle: Ensure at least one Safe Attachment Policy is enabled.
Description: Checks if at least one Safe Attachment Policy is enabled in Exchange Online.
Risk: If no Safe Attachment Policy is enabled, users may be exposed to malicious attachments, increasing the risk of malware infection.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Microsoft 365 Defender (https://security.microsoft.com). 2. Expand Email & collaboration > Policies & rules > Threat policies. 3. Under Policies, select Safe Attachments. 4. Edit or create a policy and enable it.

Recommendation.Text: Enable at least one Safe Attachment Policy to protect users from malicious attachments.

Notes: This check validates that at least one Safe Attachment Policy is enabled.
